includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Gripping drama starring Wentworth Miller. Clean-living Michael Scofield gets himself sent to prison so he can plan an escape for his innocent brother who's on death row.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Clean-living Michael Scofield gets himself sent to prison so he can plan an escape for his innocent brother who's on death row.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gripping drama starring Wentworth Miller. Clean-living Michael Scofield gets himself sent to prison so he can plan an escape for his innocent brother who's on death row.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Allen
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael's efforts to put his plan into action lead him into the middle of a race war. Lincoln tries to convince Veronica he's innocent.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael's efforts to put his plan into action lead him into the middle of a race war. Lincoln tries to convince Veronica he's innocent.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael's efforts to put his plan into action lead him into the middle of a race war. Lincoln tries to convince Veronica he's innocent.

includedAssets.title: Cell Test
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael encounters problems bringing Abruzzi and Sucre into his plan, while Lincoln must decide who he wants present at his execution.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael encounters problems bringing Abruzzi and Sucre into his plan, while Lincoln must decide who he wants present at his execution.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael encounters problems bringing Abruzzi and Sucre into his plan, while Lincoln must decide who he wants present at his execution.

includedAssets.title: Cute Poison
includedAssets.synopsis: Haywire develops an uncomfortable fascination with Michael's tattoos, while Sucre gets an unwelcome visitor. Veronica gains an ally in appealing Lincoln's case.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Haywire develops an uncomfortable fascination with Michael's tattoos, while Sucre gets an unwelcome visitor.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Haywire develops an uncomfortable fascination with Michael's tattoos, while Sucre gets an unwelcome visitor. Veronica gains an ally in appealing Lincoln's case.

includedAssets.title: English, Fitz Or Percy
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - English, Fitz Or Percy
includedAssets.synopsis: Somebody is trying to get the video that convicted Lincoln from Veronica and Nick. Elsewhere, Michael tests the first part of his escape plan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Somebody is trying to get the video that convicted Lincoln from Veronica and Nick. Elsewhere, Michael tests the first part of his escape plan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Somebody is trying to get the video that convicted Lincoln from Veronica and Nick. Elsewhere, Michael tests the first part of his escape plan.

includedAssets.title: Riots, Drills And The Devil: Part 1
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - Riots, Drills And The Devil: Part 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When Michael creates a problem with the air conditioning to buy more time out of his cell, it puts Sara and his whole plan in jeopardy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Michael creates a problem with the air conditioning to buy more time out of his cell, it puts Sara and his whole plan in jeopardy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Michael creates a problem with the air conditioning to buy more time out of his cell, it puts Sara and his whole plan in jeopardy.

includedAssets.title: Riots, Drills And The Devil: Part 2
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - Riots, Drills And The Devil: Part 2
includedAssets.synopsis: While Bellick cosies up to the governor and his hard line against the rioters, Abruzzi lends a hand labouring on the escape route.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Bellick cosies up to the governor and his hard line against the rioters, Abruzzi lends a hand labouring on the escape route.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Bellick cosies up to the governor and his hard line against the rioters, Abruzzi lends a hand labouring on the escape route.

includedAssets.title: The Old Head
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael tries to figure out how to tunnel into a building that houses a guards' break room, while T-Bag tries to dodge responsibility for Bob's murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael tries to work out how to tunnel into a building that houses a guards' break room, while T-Bag tries to dodge responsibility for Bob's murder.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael tries to figure out how to tunnel into a building that houses a guards' break room, while T-Bag tries to dodge responsibility for Bob's murder.

includedAssets.title: Tweener
includedAssets.synopsis: When T-Bag loses one slave he soon targets another, while Abruzzi's inability to meet the gangsters' demands jeopardises the escape.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When T-Bag loses one slave he soon targets another, while Abruzzi's inability to meet the gangsters' demands jeopardises the escape.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When T-Bag loses one slave he soon targets another, while Abruzzi's inability to meet the gangsters' demands jeopardises the escape.

includedAssets.title: Sleight Of Hand
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael must play his ace, costing an innocent life, to keep his plan going. Meanwhile, Nick and Veronica investigate where Steadman's money went.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael must play his ace, costing an innocent life, to keep his plan going. Meanwhile, Nick and Veronica investigate where Steadman's money went.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael must play his ace, costing an innocent life, to keep his plan going. Meanwhile, Nick and Veronica investigate where Steadman's money went.

includedAssets.title: And Then There Were 7
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep11 - And Then There Were 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Bellick is suspicious of Michael's visitor, Quinn has trouble tying up loose ends and Westmoreland finally decides to join the escape team.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bellick is suspicious of Michael's visitor, Quinn has trouble tying up loose ends and Westmoreland finally decides to join the escape team.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bellick is suspicious of Michael's visitor, Quinn has trouble tying up loose ends and Westmoreland finally decides to join the escape team.

includedAssets.title: Odd Man Out
includedAssets.synopsis: Alliances and suspicions grow as word spreads there's one too many on the escape team. A collateral cost of keeping the plan alive has a profound effect on Abruzzi.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Alliances and suspicions grow as word spreads there's one too many on the escape team.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Alliances and suspicions grow as word spreads there's one too many on the escape team. A collateral cost of keeping the plan alive has a profound effect on Abruzzi.

includedAssets.title: End Of The Tunnel
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep13 - End Of The Tunnel
includedAssets.synopsis: On the eve of Lincoln's execution, Michael must break him out of solitary to make the escape. Elsewhere, Veronica goes public with what she knows.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On the eve of Lincoln's execution, Michael must break him out of solitary to make the escape. Elsewhere, Veronica goes public with what she knows.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On the eve of Lincoln's execution, Michael must break him out of solitary to make the escape. Elsewhere, Veronica goes public with what she knows.

includedAssets.title: The Rat
includedAssets.synopsis: As Michael tries to delay Lincoln's execution by tampering with the electric chair, Veronica and Nick peruse an exhumation order for Terence Steadman's body.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael tries to delay Lincoln's execution. Veronica and Nick peruse an exhumation order for Terence Steadman's body.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Michael tries to delay Lincoln's execution by tampering with the electric chair, Veronica and Nick peruse an exhumation order for Terence Steadman's body.

includedAssets.title: By The Skin And The Teeth
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep15 - By The Skin And The Teeth
includedAssets.synopsis: Lincoln thinks he sees a face from the past in the prison, while Michael must go back to the drawing board with his escape plans.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lincoln thinks he sees a face from the past in the prison, while Michael must go back to the drawing board with his escape plans.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lincoln thinks he sees a face from the past in the prison, while Michael must go back to the drawing board with his escape plans.

includedAssets.title: Brother's Keeper
includedAssets.synopsis: Flashbacks reveal how Michael, Lincoln, Sucre, C-Note and T-Bag came to reside in Fox River, as well as how Sara came to work there.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Flashbacks reveal how Michael, Lincoln, Sucre, C-Note and T-Bag came to reside in Fox River, as well as how Sara came to work there.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Flashbacks reveal how Michael, Lincoln, Sucre, C-Note and T-Bag came to reside in Fox River, as well as how Sara came to work there.

includedAssets.title: J-Cat
includedAssets.synopsis: When Michael is thrown into solitary confinement, he comes close to drowning in despair. Sucre, meanwhile, must hide the escape hole in the guards' room.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Michael is thrown into solitary confinement, he comes close to drowning in despair.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Michael is thrown into solitary confinement, he comes close to drowning in despair. Sucre, meanwhile, must hide the escape hole in the guards' room.

includedAssets.title: Bluff
includedAssets.synopsis: In the psych ward, Michael tries to get Haywire to remember the missing pieces of his tattoo. Meanwhile, Bellick tries to auction off Michael and Sucre's unoccupied cell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the psych ward, Michael tries to get Haywire to remember the missing pieces of his tattoo.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the psych ward, Michael tries to get Haywire to remember the missing pieces of his tattoo. Meanwhile, Bellick tries to auction off Michael and Sucre's unoccupied cell.

includedAssets.title: The Key
includedAssets.synopsis: While Michael tries to figure out how to get the infirmary key from Sara, Lincoln learns of his father's role in the events that have ruined his life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Michael tries to figure out how to get the infirmary key from Sara, Lincoln learns of his father's role in the events that have ruined his life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Michael tries to figure out how to get the infirmary key from Sara, Lincoln learns of his father's role in the events that have ruined his life.

includedAssets.title: Tonight
includedAssets.synopsis: It's now or never for the group to execute their escape plan, but with Lincoln under 24-hour surveillance, Michael may be forced to leave him behind.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's now or never for the group to execute their escape plan, but with Lincoln under 24-hour surveillance, Michael may be forced to leave him behind.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's now or never for the group to execute their escape plan, but with Lincoln under 24-hour surveillance, Michael may be forced to leave him behind.

includedAssets.title: Go
includedAssets.synopsis: With Lincoln transferred to the infirmary, the escapees make it safely to Sara's unlocked office. Will they be able to go any further and make it over the wall?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Lincoln transferred to the infirmary, the escapees make it safely to Sara's unlocked office.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Lincoln transferred to the infirmary, the escapees make it safely to Sara's unlocked office. Will they be able to go any further and make it over the wall?

includedAssets.title: Flight
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season one finale, the escape plan is discovered and Bellick heads a massive manhunt for the cons. Meanwhile, Vice President Reynolds makes a shocking power play.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the season one finale, the escape plan is discovered and Bellick heads a massive manhunt for the cons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the season one finale, the escape plan is discovered and Bellick heads a massive manhunt for the cons. Meanwhile, Vice President Reynolds makes a shocking power play.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: After his brother is sent to death row for a crime he didn’t commit, Michael Scofield devises a plan to get arrested and break him out using the prison blueprints cryptically tattooed across his back. Thrilling U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After his brother is sent to death row, Michael Scofield devises a plan to get arrested and break him out. Thrilling drama starring Wentworth Miller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After his brother is sent to death row for a crime he didn’t commit, Michael Scofield devises a plan to get arrested and break him out using the prison blueprints cryptically tattooed across his back. Thrilling U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The newly dubbed ‘Fox River Eight’ are out of prison, but far from freedom. They struggle to evade the police, The Company and FBI Agent Alexander Mahone (William Fichtner). Season two of the smash-hit U.S. thriller starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The ‘Fox River Eight’ are out, but must now evade the police, The Company and FBI Agent Alexander Mahone (William Fichtner). Wentworth Miller stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The newly dubbed ‘Fox River Eight’ are out of prison, but far from freedom. They struggle to evade the police, The Company and FBI Agent Alexander Mahone (William Fichtner). Season two of the smash-hit U.S. thriller starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael finds himself in a familiar situation, which The Company seek to use to their advantage. Thrilling third season of the smash-hit U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael is in a familiar situation, which The Company seek to use to their advantage. Third season of the hit U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael finds himself in a familiar situation, which The Company seek to use to their advantage. Thrilling third season of the smash-hit U.S. drama starring Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael goes to extreme lengths to finally bring down The Company and earn his freedom. Season four of the smash-hit drama, filled with thrilling twists and turns. Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael goes to extreme lengths to finally bring down The Company and earn his freedom. Season four of the smash-hit drama starring Wentworth Miller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael goes to extreme lengths to finally bring down The Company and earn his freedom. Season four of the smash-hit drama, filled with thrilling twists and turns. Wentworth Miller, Dominic Purcell and William Fichtner star.

includedIn.title: Prison Break
includedIn.synopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A structural engineer gets himself thrown in jail so he can execute an audacious plan to free his incarcerated brother.

title: Prison Break Seasons 1-4
synopsis: After his brother is sent to death row for a crime he didn’t commit, Michael Scofield devises a plan to get arrested and break him out using the prison blueprints cryptically tattooed across his back, before exposing the conspiracy that put him away. Thrilling US drama starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.
shortSynopsis: After his brother is sent to death row, Michael Scofield devises a plan to get arrested, break him out and expose the conspiracy that put him away.
mediumSynopsis: After his brother is sent to death row for a crime he didn’t commit, Michael Scofield devises a plan to get arrested and break him out using the prison blueprints cryptically tattooed across his back, before exposing the conspiracy that put him away. Thrilling US drama starring Wentworth Miller and Dominic Purcell.
guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence
